aima.core.logic.fol.inference

Class FOLTFMResolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.logic.fol.inference.FOLTFMResolution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceProcedure

    public class FOLTFMResolution
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceProcedure
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 347.

    The algorithmic approach is identical to the propositional case, described in Figure 7.12.

    However, this implementation will use the T)wo F)inger M)ethod for looking for resolvents between clauses, which is very inefficient.

    see:
    http://logic.stanford.edu/classes/cs157/2008/lectures/lecture04.pdf, slide 21 for the propositional case. In addition, an Answer literal will be used so that queries with Variables may be answered (see pg. 350 of AIMA3e).
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly
